#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[105];
int main() {
	int t,n,m,i,j=0,k,sum=0;
	while(1)
	{
		cin>>n;
		if(!n)
		break;
		j++;
		sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
			sum+=a[i];
		}
		m=sum/n;
		int ans=0;
		//cout<<m<<" ";
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(a[i]<m)
			ans+=(m-a[i]);
		}
		cout<<"Set #"<<j<<"\nThe minimum number of moves is "<<ans<<".\n";
		//cout<<ans;
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
